Comment Go Back Download “One world, One Burger” - McDonald’s 2 CERTIFICATE 3 AKNOWLEDGEMENT I HAVE GREAT PLEASURE IN PRESENTING MY PROJECT EN TI TL ED MC DO NA LD I TA KE TH IS AN OP PO RT UN IT Y TO EX PR ES S MY DE EP ES T GR AT IT UD E & IN EP TN ES S T O A LL TH OS E WH O CO NT RI BU TE D IN DI RE CT LY TH EI R VA LU AB LE TIME&ASSISTED ME IN MY PROJECT. I WOULD LIKE TO THANK MY PROJECT GUIDES, ALL THE FACULTY MEMBERS. FOR THIS APPROVAL&ALSO FOR HER VALUABLE GUIDANCE&SUPPORT IN COMPLETING MY PROJECT OF MC DONALD. LAST BUT NOT THE LEAST I WOULD LIKE TO EXPRESS MY SINCERE THANKS TO THOSE WHO DIRECTLY&INDIRECTLY HELPED IN THIS PROJECT.
